title: Minister Gamini Lokuge’s driver beaten to death
body_lines: The driver of Energy Minister Gamini Lokuge has been beaten to death at his residence in Mawiththara in Kesbewa this evening, Police said.
They said a group of men had assaulted the driver and he had died on admission to the hospital.
The Kesbewa Police are investigating to determine the reason of the attack. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
